examples: to squeeze a tube of toothpaste
exprimir un tubo de pasta de dientes
to squeeze the trigger of a gun (= to fire it)
apretar el gatillo de una pistola (= disparar)
He squeezed her hand and smiled at her.
Le apretó la mano y le sonrió.
Just take hold of the tube and squeeze.
Simplemente agarre el tubo y apriete.
